original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND c.Score=0 AND p.Score<=21 AND p.AnswerCount<=3 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-11 18:35:08' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation<=240
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score <= 21 AND posts.AnswerCount <= 3 AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation <= 240
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E6.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E6E3.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 18:35:08'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E3E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E6E3E4.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E3E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E6E3E4E5 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E6E3E4E5.Id)
